body: This is an [R](http://r-project.org) package for sequential Monte Carlo (particle filtering) utilities. The package can be installed in [R](http://r-project.org) using ``install.packages("smcUtils")`` and loaded using ``library(smcUtils)``.
tagline: utility functions for performing sequential Monte Carlo (SMC) otherwise known as particle filtering
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: smcUtils
